page.title: 14A Westhill Pupil's Day
page.content: There are two types of schools in the area for children in Westhill to get their education. There is the primary for pupils aged 5-11 and the academy for ages 12 and up.At the primary the pupils have one teacher except specialist subjects such as arts and crafts.They have a break at 10.40 till 11.00.Lunch time is at 12.00 for kids aged 5-7 and 12.20 for the senior pupils.The infants get out at 3.00 and the senior pupils finish at 3.30.Both the schools start at 9.00 but the academy pupils have a tutorial till 9.30: this is where the tutor takes registration and reads out the bulletin which has daily notices in it. At 9.30 the pupils go to their morning class. First break is at 10.45-11.00. Lunch is at 12.15-1.15 : the second break is at 2.30-2.45. All pupils finish at 4.00.
